definition: (to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
surname Bai

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
suffix for nouns
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: Whenas I wish you both a lifetime of happiness.
sentences.chinese: 然而我还是祝愿妳们白头到老，幸福美满。

sentences.english: Atzel and Aksah were extremely happy, and both lived to an old age.
sentences.chinese: 阿采尔跟阿克萨非常幸福地白头到老。

sentences.english: How can you promise that we can grow old together?
sentences.chinese: 那你怎么敢保证就可以跟我白头到老呢？

sentences.english: Wishes you to grow old together, lives early expensively sub.
sentences.chinese: 祝你们白头到老，早生贵子。

definition: (to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
enduring while the world lasts (idiom)/eternal
to moisten with spittle (idiom); sharing meager resources/mutual help in humble circumstances
lit. to lift the tray to eyebrow level (idiom); mutual respect in a marriage
to love each other
to stay together/to rely on one another
may you live a long and happy life together (wedding greeting)
(of a couple) to be harmonious/to be each other's sunshine
love is more solid than gold (idiom)

a whole lifetime (idiom); all my life
faithful unto death (i.e. Confucian ban on widow remarrying)
to have an affinity with each other (idiom)/to find each other congenial
happy/blissful
to be kind and love one another (idiom); bound by deep emotions
